scripts.predeploy: (cd frontend && npm install && npm run build) && (cd hosting && npm install) && (cd exporter && npm install)
scripts.deploy: (cd hosting && npm run deploy) && (cd docker && npm run deploy) && (cd exporter && npm run deploy)
scripts.audit: (cd frontend && npm audit >> ../audit_report.txt); (cd hosting && npm audit >> ../audit_report.txt); (cd exporter && npm audit >> ../audit_report.txt)
scripts.auditfix: (cd frontend && npm audit fix --force); (cd hosting && npm audit fix --force); (cd exporter && npm audit fix --force)
